title: Foreign exchange reserves rise to $ 272 million: Gill
content:
ISLAMABAD, Jun 4 (APP):Special Assistant to the Prime Minister on Political Communication Dr Shahbaz Gill on Friday said that foreign exchange reserves have increased to $ 272 million.
In a tweet, he said that readymade garments exports were increased by 296 percent which was reached $ 243 million on April 21.
زرمبادلہ کے ذخائر میں27کروڑ20لاکھ ڈالر کا اضافہریڈی میڈ گارمنٹس کے ایکسپورٹ میں %296اضافہ، اپریل21 میں$234M تک پہنچ گئیں
کرپٹ الائنس معیشت پر منفی پروپیگنڈے اور حملے کرتا رہے گا مگر ملک انشاء اللہ ترقی کی راہ پر یوں ہی گامزن رہے گا اور پاکستانیوں کیلئے مثبت خبریں آتی رہیں گی pic.twitter.com/JPA1utZSFx
— Dr. Shahbaz GiLL (@SHABAZGIL) June 4, 2021
He said that the corrupt opposition alliance will continue to spread negative propaganda and attacks on the economy, but the country will continue to move forward on the path of progress and prosperity.
He expressed the hope that more good news will continue to come for Pakistanis.
